newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - IPO PRICING - Allstar Systems.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - IPO PRICING - Allstar Systems.

text.p: NOTE: Terms were modified for the planned initial public offering in Allstar, calling for a target price of $6, compared with an estimated price range of $7 to $8. The original estimated price range was $8 to $10.
The proposed number of shares was lowered to 1,767,500 from 2.035 million.

The offering consists of 1.5 million shares to be sold by the company and 267,500 to be sold by a shareholder. The company has granted the underwriters a 45-day option on an additional 265,125 shares for the purpose of covering over-allotments.
